page.title: 11 THE PEEL HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: {Peel Health Centre}was opened in 1971, there are 34 rooms and over 30 staff. The staff include 7{G.P's.,}1{Medical {Officer,}5{School Nurses,}6{District {Nurses}and 3{Health Visitors,}as well as several{receptionists/secretaries. The Centre is open from 08.45 to 17.00. About 200 patients are seen daily in the various clinics. These are for{Dentistry, Speech Therapy, {Chiropody, & Hearing.}There is also an {Eye Clinic, a Baby Clinic, an Alergy {Clinic, a Well Woman Clinic & Family {Planning.}The School Nurses visit nurseries & schools for medicals and hair inspection. At the Centre children are medically examined for places at{Special Schools.}The Centre also helps to promote{Home Safety {Campaigns.}Most common ailments in Bury are respiratory diseases.
